txt.en:
'Thank you for your assistance, [placeholder]. Without your help, setting up an outpost here would have been much more difficult. And perhaps we would have sent aid supplies to goblins.'

Nashôn's face momentarily flushes red before he clears his throat and resumes speaking.

'Our work here will continue, but I will only ask one more thing of you. Belondor wants a report on how things are proceeding here at Kruha-sûrja. Would you mind speaking to him in Dâr Laja on our behalf? Thank you for all of your help [placeholder].'
You have helped the guards that Belondor sent to the sewers beneath the Sail-haven of Umbar Baharbêl.
Nashôn has asked you to report to Belondor in Dâr Laja, the Meeting-hall in Umbar Baharbêl with news of the guards' progress in the sewers beneath the Sail-haven.

'[placeholder], you have returned. How goes the efforts in the sewers?'

You tell Belondor of the efforts taken in the new guard post at Kruha-sûrja, and he nods.

'Thank you for helping them get a head start while they work on setting up the outpost. Assuring the safety of the people of the Sail-haven will go a long way in restoring their confidence in the Kindred of the Coins.'
